About

I am an Associate Professor in the Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering at Rowan University, where I perform research in data mining and applied machine learning.

Education

Degree Institution Dates
PhD Drexel University 2015
MSc Rowan University 2011
BSc The Pennsylvania College of Technology 2008

Position Institution Dates

Electronics Systems Engineer QorTek, Inc. 2009
